King.quote: Captain of the chessboard, ruling the seas with wisdom and might.

Queen.quote: The Queen, she be the fiercest beauty of the seas, striking fear into the hearts of all who dare cross her path.

Bishop.quote: The Bishop, a cunning navigator, guiding the crew through treacherous waters with divine insight.

Knight.quote: The Knight, swift as the wind, charging across the battlefield with daring bravery.

Rook.quote: The Rook, sturdy fortress of the crew, standing tall and resolute, protecting the King's treasure.

Pawn.quote: Lowly pawn, but beware, for even the smallest deckhand can rise to claim the treasure and become a legend of the seas.
